hero.title: Engineer - Full-Stack Developer

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Designing the future of the web
about.description: I am a French apprentice in my second year of engineering school, with four years of experience as a web developer. Currently looking for a 9-week internship abroad to gain practical experience and enhance my skills. I enjoy collaborating with others, learning new technologies, and tackling challenges with a proactive mindset.
about.hobbies: Sports and travel play an important role in my life : they nurture my curiosity, my drive for self-improvement, and my open-mindedness.

1.title: Doodle Jump - Autopilot AI
1.description: Doodle Jump from scratch, creating an AI model for automatic navigation.
1.longDescription: Doodle Jump from scratch, creating an AI model for automatic navigation.

2.title: PWA Application - Prevention
2.description: Alcohol consumption prevention. Blood alcohol level simulation. Avoid driving under the influence.
2.longDescription: PWA application for alcohol consumption prevention, with blood alcohol level simulation.

3.title: Mobile Application - Pomodoro
3.description: Mobile application for productivity management, scheduling and music.
3.longDescription: Mobile application for productivity management, scheduling and music.

description: Migrated a business-critical application (200+ daily users) from legacy PHP 5 to Symfony
Optimized data models and led feature redesigns, improving performance and maintainability
Collaborated with teams (Product, Development, Support) in Agile context
Designed and deployed a custom ERP used daily by 80+ employees across 10 teams
Built web-based management tools for schedules, meetings, and paid leave
Directed the full project lifecycle: requirements analysis, UI/UX design, database architecture, and implementation

1.description: Learning development and building technical and professional skills in a company environment.

dataProtection.title: Personal data protection
dataProtection.description: No personal data is collected on this website. This is a personal portfolio website that does not collect, store or process any personal data from visitors.
dataProtection.rights: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectification, deletion, limitation, opposition and portability of your personal data. For any request regarding your personal data, you can contact us at the e-mail address indicated in the legal notices.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: This website does not use cookies. No tracking, analytics or preference cookies are placed on your device during your visit.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual property
intellectualProperty.description: All elements contained on this website (texts, images, logos, source code) are the exclusive property of Olivier Recher and are protected by intellectual property laws. Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the site's elements, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited without prior written authorization from Olivier Recher.

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.description: The site editor strives to provide information on the site as accurate as possible. However, it cannot be held responsible for omissions, inaccuracies and deficiencies in the update, whether they are its fault or that of third-party partners who provide this information. All information indicated on the site is given for information purposes only, and is likely to evolve. Furthermore, the information appearing on the site is not exhaustive.

externalLinks.title: External links
externalLinks.description: This website may contain links to other websites. The site editor is not responsible for the content, privacy practices or policies of external sites to which links are provided. The presence of links to other sites does not constitute approval or recommendation of these sites or their content.
